channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0442; 09:18AM; 11729 W Hartsook St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4dVCvlW" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4dVCvlW</a>; #ValleyVillage; Firefighters found fire to the rear, inside of a single family home. Thirty-two LAFD firefighters extinguished the flames in 19 minutes. Two elderly females sustained minor smoke inhalation and will be transported to the hospital. Cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E227 E260 E278 E288 E289 E60 E86 E87 E88 E89 E97 EM11 EM17 EM5 HR3 RA102 RA86 RA860 RA889 RA89 SO1 SQ87 T27 T60 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0442; 08:59AM; 11729 W Hartsook St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4dVCvlW" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4dVCvlW</a>; #ValleyVillage; One-story single family home with fire in the rear. Paramedics are treating two patients. Offensive mode.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E260 E278 E289 E60 E86 EM11 EM5 RA102 RA86 RA860 RA89 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision - Fatality; INC#0150; 02:13AM; 1300 N Alameda St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4aBnZNd" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4aBnZNd</a>; #Wilmington; Firefighters responded to a traffic collision to find a vehicle on fire. Firefighters quickly extinguished the flames upon arrival. Sadly, they found two occupants deceased inside the vehicle. Age and gender were not able to be identified. It was unclear if they were wearing their seatbelts at the time of the crash. LAPD Inc #0426. Nothing further.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E38 RA38; CH7; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0138; 02:05AM; 3214 Whiteside St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3R0WFRK" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3R0WFRK</a>; #EastLosAngeles; Firefighters responded to a boarded-up one-story single family home with heavy fire showing, and engaged in defensive firefighting operations (from the exterior only). The first 32 LAFD firefighters took 24 minutes (2:29am) to respond, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District outside city; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E201 E203 E25 EM1 RA1 RA25 RA801 T1 T3 T9; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 05/26/2024 INC#0055

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0055; 01:52AM; 1816 N Wilton Pl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bSoaVp" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bSoaVp</a>; #Hollywood; Firefighters arrived to find heavy fire showing from a two-story vacant craftsman-style home. For a portion of the fire, firefighters retreated into the defensive mode and fought the fire from the exterior only, transitioning again inside the structure to finish extinguishing the flames in hard-to-reach areas. Ultimately, it took 70 firefighters 49 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E3 E35 E52 E76 E82C EA1 EA2 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA27 RA82 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0055; 01:03AM; 1816 N Wilton Pl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bSoaVp" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bSoaVp</a>; #Hollywood; Two-story vacant craftsman-style home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E3 E35 E52 E76 E82C EM11 EM5 HR3 RA27 RA82 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

RV Fire; INC#0183; 03:35AM; 608 N Mission Rd; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QYZDGi" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QYZDGi</a>; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters arrived to find several of RVs on fire. It took 20 firefighters 47 minutes to extinguish the flames, which damaged or destroyed at least eight RVs. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 E202 E209 E4 E9 RA2 T2; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0151; 02:54AM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG</a>; #Chatsworth; A total of 39 firefighters battled flames in a one-story single-family mobile home and extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. One patient was transported to the hospital, unknown age/gender/condition. LAPD Inc #0489. Cause under investigation. Nothing further. ; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E104 E107 E273 E28 E287 E296 E70 EM15 RA107 RA896 RA96 T73 T87 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0103; 01:51AM; 206 E 23rd St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4dUwMwE" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4dUwMwE</a>; #HistoricSouthCentral; Firefighters responded to a two-story multifamily residential building that caught fire after a vehicle crashed into the first floor (end of police pursuit?). Two of the four occupants in the vehicle were transported to the hospital in fair condition, while the other two declined further care. It took 52 firefighters 22 minutes to extinguish the flames, which they contained to just one unit. No firefighter injuries. LAPD Inc #343. Nothing further.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E3 E9 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA15 RA3 RA803 RA809 RA810 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1368; 07:50PM; 1030 W Alpine St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3WPhoM2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3WPhoM2</a>; #Chinatown; Firefighters arrived to find a vacant residential dwelling with heavy fire showing. This structure had burned previously and was already ventilated from past firefighting operations, therefore the 32 responding LAFD firefighters were able to effectively extinguish the flames from the exterior in 16 minutes, without injury. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC2 E20 E203 E220 E3 E4 RA20 RA803 SO1 SQ21 T20 T3; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
